title: A Promise of Glory
description: David Strong came to the colonies with a Bible and a smoldering passion for revenge...Hero - he bravely waged a one-man war against the British for the young, embattled country.Explorer - he lived among the Indians, adopted them as his own and gave his heart to a tender young maiden.Spy - he was Colonel Washington's handpicked scout, stalking the enemy on America's northern shores.Lover - his burning touch ignited the desires of three beautiful women destined to fight a dangerous war for his very soul.Avenger - he pledged to sever treacherous family ties with his father's sword.Patriarch - with a brave woman by his side, he would found a new American dynasty.
author: Frederick Nolan
